description:
Get to the target score of 5,000 but be sure not to go over!

This game was made in a few hours to avoid burnout while working in another game of mine. This game is also my first to include mobile/touch support, meaning it can be played on a computer or something like a phone or tablet.

Controls

Click or touch a target to destroy it. 

Double click or tap the reset button to start over.

Scoring

  50 points - Large target, flies mostly vertically, generally short arcs.

100 points - Small target, flies mostly horizontally, wide arcs.

500 points - Small and fast target, flies mostly vertically, huge arcs which go above the screen before falling back to the ground.
